Highly recommended.

The material was good quality though. The corset top was kinda weird. The material stretched so it top was a little loose. The folds are not flat. They pop op out when you wear it and you can see through the middle where the clasps meet. Could be fixed with a black bandeau. Definitely for more curve women with a larger bust.
